item.description:
Dear Boston Volunteers,

As you all know Boston Volunteers is organizing a fundraiser on June 29, 2013 to benefit the Animal Rescue League of Boston, New Medford Dog park and Boston Volunteers.

As we are hosting our first Doggy run (www.doggyfunrun.org), campaign plays a vital role in this project, we are looking for some volunteers who can participate in this project.

Note: Doggy Fun Run Volunteer T-shirt will be provided to all the campaign volunteers at the venue during the day of the event.

Campaign will happen every weekend till June 29 at multiple locations listed below, please pick a location you wish to volunteer and let me know on the comments section of this event page:

The Smart Race-Boston, MA

Trader joes-Brookline

Local Dog Park-In your neighborhood

What do you do do?

Stand at the Start or Finish line and hand out flyers at the event. You can have one more volunteer with you if possible. 2 volunteers is an optimum number for the campaign.

I will drop of you off flyers during the week for the weekend campaign.

Thanks

Phani

Cell: 505-301-6872

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Campaign for the Doggy Fun Run (Multiple Locations)
